ModMetaData.name: Silence the HAR
ModMetaData.author: Abraxas
ModMetaData.description:
Disables Debug features of HAR Addons, this will supress all the Yellow start up warnings caused by them. Disable this mod when making, editing, or patching races. Use this mod when you are going to post a HugsLog and don't want to drown the log with Variants.
In 1.4 or after load this mod before Humanoid Alien Races Framework.
